Articles.Content:
Can anyone tell me if there is a limit to how many kerbal applicants you can have in the astronaut complex? I am add my twitch followers to the game as kerbals and it was working fine with arount 190 but i now have 221 and for some reason it is removing all the "applicant" type kerbals, replacing them with random generated kerbals (about 10 of them) and leaving the custom "crew" type in there. is there a way to prevent the game from removing them short of setting all as "Crew"?

Edit: the game is no longer letting me have less than 180 in the astronaut complex as "Applicant" when yesterday i could have 190, i dont understand why

Edited October 4, 2014 by MaLuS
